text: while back in the renaissance era a painter named Bartolome Bermejo he was a painter in the renaissance era that was unsure of his work he was born some day then eventually died at the age of 58 well from then on he went on to pursue music and changed his name to the now well know oh i guess you'll never know. One of his painting being a disturbing painting showing multiple men laughing and whipping a middle aged women and she was top half bare showing emotion of such a fragile state we are well aware of this emotion but this painting captures it in such a gruesome way.
